title: Please anybody could tell me what this font is?
content:
Please anybody could tell me what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HERSHEYS\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/typophile.com/files/HERSHEYS_1.jpg) | 73.51 KB |
author: Washiki

comments.content: The Hersheys type logo is a registered trademark and is probably custom, that being said Helvetica (Ultra Compressed) is very close.
@bojev: even if you're totally right about the official Hershey's logo, Washiki asked for a totally different font (which I was not able to identify so far)
How is it different? - I said Helvetica (Ultra Compressed) is close and I was looking at his image when I made that comment.

They look totally different to me :)

Washiki's sample

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6193.png)

Hershey's official logo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3828.png)
You are indeed correct the R is very different - and the letters are more compressed.

Can't definitely match such /R and /S at the same time so here are some alternatives (some close for /R, some for /S): [Franchise SmallCaps](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.derekweathersbee.com/franchise) (the one that would need the less adjustments, mainly on /S finials), [Dharma Gothic Expanded](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/dharma-gothic) (overall the closest but /R totally off), [Elephantmen Taller Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/elephantmen-greater-and-taller) (/S off, /R counter to be adjusted), [Bourgeois Ultra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/virusfonts/bourgeois) (/S off), [Berber](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterbox/berber) (/S off), [Header](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/header), [Block Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr), a mix of [Komu A (/R)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu) and [Komu B (/S)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu), [Tungsten](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100035) (/R off), [Heroic Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621052824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typetrust/heroic-condensed)

Ryuk and bojev, both of you  
thank you so much!
